name: Asteroid Runner (SoundWall)
description:
Space pirates! Fly your spaceship through meteorites without getting caught by pirates and the traps they lay in your path. Your only goal is to escape!

  • Upgrade your weapons by collecting dropped parts. You will need all the power to open your way through never-ending fields of meteorites!
  • Use your shield to counter unavoidable situations. But be on the lookout for your energy reserves!
  • Each level becomes faster; with waves which get stronger!

Asteroid Runner works on Windows platform. Simply download .zip (and extract contents to anywhere) or .exe (and install game to anywhere) version to play the game.

Note: A discrete video card (Nvidia MX 450 or higher) is recommended for optimum performance.
